title.native: オルタンシア・サーガ

description:
When the duke of Hortensia murdered the king, he unleashed a wave of chaos that spilled the blood of many. Brazenly building his kingdom on the ashes of the old one, his violent rule has left many orphans in its wake. But now, the king’s heir has come of age. Living in secret as a man, she’s remained safe, and the time has come to gather allies to take back what is her’s—both country and throne!

(Source: Funimation)
synonyms: ตำนานฮอร์เท็นเซีย

tags.name: Gore

tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Survival
tags.description: Centers around the struggle to live in spite of extreme obstacles.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

tags.description: Centers around the sport of archery, or prominently features the use of archery in combat.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Crime
tags.description: Centers around unlawful activities punishable by the state or other authority.

tags.name: Zombie
tags.description: Prominently features reanimated corpses which often prey on live humans and turn them into zombies.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: Werewolf

node.description:
A Japanese rock band from Shibuya, Tokyo. Formed in 2011, the band currently consists of vocalist Hiroki Moriuchi, guitarist Teruki Nishizawa, bassist Nobuaki Katou, and drummer Shouhei Sasaki.

(Source: Wikipedia)

__[Blog (JP)](https://ameblo.jp/zen0115/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ZENTA_guitar)__ | __[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/zenta_guitar/)__ | __[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/zen0115)__

__Birthplace:__ Saitama Prefecture, Japan
__Residency:__ Kawaguchi City, Saitama Prefecture, Japan

__Zenta Tsuchihashi__ is a Japanese guitarist, lyricist, composer, arranger and member of music production company Zenraku.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/6_kai)__

__Residency:__ Yokohama, Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan

__Yoshihide Mukai__ is a Japanese visual effects specialist and CG artist.

__[Website](http://uni-mafumafu.jp/) | [Blog (JP)](https://ameblo.jp/uni-mafumafu) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/uni_mafumafu) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOTR1tcOAhjgi6YukrPpZxg) | [Piapro](https://piapro.jp/uni_mafumafu)__

__Introduction:__
Mafumafu, alternatively known as Kagami Mite Shisshin-P, is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer, arranger, vocaloid producer, and audio engineer. He is better known as a utaite with a middle-high range voice.

__Biography:__
As a utaite he likes to add effects to his voice and scream loudly in his covers. He has a very wide vocal range and a versatile voice, having the ability to hit and leap into high notes effortlessly, sometimes to feminine range, without sounding strained or loosing the softness in his voice. However, he also sounds pleasant when he sings songs in his regular and lower voice, which can sound relaxing and quite soothing. On some of his covers, many people are often confused and argue about his gender when he utilizes his higher register, therefore making him a ryouserui. Because of his high vocal range, he is also capable of producing a very convincing female voice, most clearly seen in his cover of Matryoshka. He often makes use of his wide range in his covers by leaping into higher or lower octaves to match the tone of the song.

Occasionally he forgets some of the lyrics and either mumbles or makes cute noises until the next line. His songs are often tagged as someone with a "kakuseirui", also known as an energizing voice.
